alert.note: Alert for Lower Treasure Valley; Upper Treasure Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 17 at 10:41PM MST until January 18 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain, sleet, and snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch with ice accumulations up to a tenth of an inch. * WHERE...In Idaho, Lower Treasure Valley ID and Upper Treasure Valley zones. In Oregon, Oregon Lower Treasure Valley zone. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Freezing rain is more likely in the Boise Metro Area and snow more likely in the Lower Treasure Valley. Roads may be slick during the Thursday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Lower Treasure Valley; Upper Treasure Valley
